data.persistant

Class Persistent

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.persistant.Persistent

  • public class Persistent
extends java.lang.Object
    static class for keeping track of preferences, file paths etc
    Author:
    SamSchofield

      checks if a valid file path has been set

      returns an ArrayList of all the users found in the user directories
      static void init()
      loads all the profiles from the users directory into the ObservableList users
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      static void newUser(User user)
      creates a new directory in users with name user to store information in also adds a user.json and activity.json file to save data to

      sets the FilePath preference to a Fitr directory at location of filePath
      static void setupDirectory()
      sets up a new Fitr directory with a users sub directory at the file path

      Sets the current user
